name: R.C Racing
description:
A Simple Free Racing game made on unreal.

For mow there is only one gamemode (Race) but there are plans to make other modes like Demolition 

There are 6 cars available Buggy, Box Truck, Sportscar, Hatchback, Pickup and SUV

Drone(mainly Quadcopter) is in development
Game is in early access so expect some Bugs and/or Glitches popping up here and there . Do let me know, so i can work on them
